meanings.definition: To make (paper) smooth and glossy by pressing between rollers.
meanings.sent1: The factory worker will supercalender the paper to give it a shiny finish.
meanings.sent2: She used the supercalender to make the paper look sleek and professional.
meanings.sent3: The supercalender worked its magic on the paper, turning it into a glossy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: With the supercalender, the paper transformed into a smooth canvas ready for printing.
meanings.sent5: After running through the supercalender, the paper gleamed like a polished gem.

meanings.sent1: The supercalender in the corner of the room hummed softly as it worked on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The old supercalender was a crucial part of the paper production process.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to nap on top of the supercalender, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: The supercalender stood tall in the factory, a silent but essential member of the team.
meanings.sent5: As the paper passed through the supercalender, it emerged with a glossy sheen.
